notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.M., M.J.G., Q.L., and G.v.M. conceived and designed the study. M.J.G. and R.L. gathered the patient data and applied for ethics approval. L.M., D.P. and Q.L. designed the methods, carried out data analysis, and generated the figures and tables. L.M., D.P., M.J.G., Q.L. and G.v.M. wrote the draft manuscript. P.K. and J.H. helped optimize and test our R scripts during the analysis and participated in editing the manuscript. Everyone has read and approved the final manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
